items.title: Young Audiences Arts for Learning
items.subtitle: Young Audiences 2019 Promo
items.desc: Young Audiences Arts for Learning is a national organization with thirty affiliate organizations around the country. I created a 30 second promotional video to help further increase brand awareness on their social channels. I developed the creative, edited, and animated the promo.
items.caption: Young Audiences

items.title: Block Party 2019 Promo
items.desc: One of the biggest events for the Rubin Museum, the annual Block Party is attended by thousands of New Yorkers of all ages. To promote it, I worked with the design team and I produced, edited, and animated two videos for this event.
items.caption: Block Party 2019

items.title: Clapping with Stones Exhibition Promo Video
items.desc: Clapping with Stones: Art and Acts of Resistance is an immersive site-specific exhibition that examines social, cultural, and political events through a local and global lens, offering unique perspectives from 10 contemporary artists. Working with the Museum’s Creative Head, I produced, edited and animated a promo video for this exhibition.
items.caption: Clapping Stone Exhibition

items.title: Brainwave Series Promo
items.desc: Brainwave, the Rubin Museum’s longest-running program series, investigates how our minds shape our everyday experiences, incorporating Eastern and Western philosophy, science, art, and other disciplines. I worked with a videographer and the Museum’s Creative Head to edit and produce several videos for the 2018 Brainwave program series.
items.caption: Brainwave Promo

items.title: Compassionate Action Series Promo
items.desc: For this program series, I created a series of promo videos where I developed the creative, shot the interviews with several well known Meditation Leaders, and I edited the footage and animated any graphical elements.
items.caption: Compassionate Action Promo

items.title: Power Trip Promo Video
items.desc: Using an After Effects template, I reworked the template to create a short promo video for a major fundraising event for the Rubin Museum of Art.
items.caption: Power Trip
